definitions.definition: To increase the defenses of; to strengthen and secure by military works; to render defensible against an attack by hostile forces.
To impart strength or vigor to.
To add spirits to wine to increase the alcohol content.
definitions.example: Sherry is made by fortifying wine.

definitions.definition: To increase the nutritional value of food by adding ingredients.
definitions.example: Soy milk is often fortified with calcium.
